widgets_values:
Raise the sword and point forward, distinctive blue glow Armor, (blue lightsaber:1.15), Helmet with horns obscures face, adding to warrior aesthetic, Armor is intricate and detailed, suggesting significance within context of story or game, Overall atmosphere is intense and mysterious,

Character in armor stands against forest backdrop.

nodes.title: Positive Prompt
widgets_values:
Raise the sword and point forward, distinctive blue glow Armor, (red lightsaber:1.15), Helmet with horns obscures face, adding to warrior aesthetic, Armor is intricate and detailed, suggesting significance within context of story or game, Overall atmosphere is intense and mysterious,

Character in armor stands against forest backdrop.
You are a text2image prompt engineer, good at writing prompt

Please convert this long description into prompt, ''The image features a character dressed in armor, standing against a dark background. The armor appears to be made of black metal and is adorned with orange sparks or flames that give it a glowing effect. The character's face is obscured by a helmet with horns, adding to the warrior-like appearance. The overall aesthetic suggests a fantasy or science fiction setting. There are no visible texts or other objects in the image.''

nodes.title: Image prompt
widgets_values: Please describe the content of the picture in detail, focusing on the main character (or animal/plant/object).
Please convert the paragraph text in brackets into text2image  prompt with words and sentences, and the prompt is limited to about 74 words(

In the image, there is a small hamster sitting on a rocky surface. The hamster is wearing a yellow knit hat and is holding a blue Pepsi can in its paws. It appears to be posing for the photo, as it is looking directly at the camera. The background of the image shows a scenic landscape with mountains and a river, indicating that the photo was taken outdoors. The hamster's position on the rocks and its attire suggest that this could be a staged photo meant to be humorous or whimsical.
Best within 75 words/词不是越多越好，最好控制在75字以内

Please note! Calling localized LLM will consume a lot of video memory. It is recommended to switch the seed manually.

请注意！调用本地化LLM会消耗大量显存，建议手动切换种子
You are an assistant very good at describing what is in the picture
Please describe the content of the picture in detail, focusing on the main character (or animal/plant/object).

,a small hamster sitting on a rocky surface and (Looking around:1.9), wearing a yellow knit hat and holding a blue Pepsi can in its paws. The hamster should be posing for the photo, looking directly at the camera. The background should depict a scenic landscape with mountains and a river

,a small hamster sitting on a rocky surface and (Looking around:1.9), wearing a yellow knit hat and holding a blue Pepsi can in its paws. The hamster should be posing for the photo, looking directly at the camera. The background should depict a scenic landscape with mountains and a river
cartoon, painting, illustration, (worst quality, low quality),

Switch according to the number of key frames

根据关键帧数量修改数值

Purple node is generally a switching node

紫色节点一般是切换节点

Due to the dynamic nature of node naming, the group node cannot be recognized by the comfyui manager, so the group node can only be canceled. If you want it to be beautiful, concise and easy to understand, it is recommended to Ctrol multiple nodes to form a group node.

由于节点命名的动态性导致组节点无法被comfyui管理器识别，只能取消组节点，想要美观简洁易懂，建议自行Ctrol多个节点形成组节点。

I just discovered that using two pictures to open the Loop and using the sparsectrl method "ending" at 16 frames can get good movements.

刚刚才发现用16帧打开循环Sparsectrl“ending”方法（通常24帧关闭循环）生成时，能生成质量不错的动作，或许可以直接应用到4帧视频预测里面。

Actions can be obtained by adding prompt words

动作可以通过提示词获取

The core is to obtain 4 consecutive frames of action.

想要幅度更大的动作，核心是获得4个连续变化较小动作的关键帧

Before compositing the action, it is best to synthesize 4 pictures in advance including natural blinking images as base images and eye status (normal, slightly closed, closed eyes, normal)<By change prompt: closed eyes slowy>

想要人物自然眨眼效果，建议预先生成4帧带有自然眨眼动作的底片，四帧动作（睁眼，半闭眼，闭眼，睁眼）

It is difficult to achieve perfect and smooth action effects. After all, 24-frame action deduction is performed in Sparsectrl based on 16-frame training. The larger the character's movements, the more difficult it is. It depends on luck.

想要动作完美很难，毕竟Sparsectrl是基于16帧视频训练，在此基础上训练24帧已经快接近极限，测试过26帧往上人物就会大幅失真，而且人物越多动作越多动作幅度越大越容易失真，看运气

Because the image will produce a serious color cast after repeated calls to the RGB encoder, a color cast repair is added.

因为图片每经过一次sparsectrl的RGB编码都会产生偏色，积少成多，最后出片根本看不了，加了一个移植PS的快速偏色修复节点，还可以

The theoretical basis comes from https://guoyww.github.io/projects/SparseCtrl/

理论方法来自于https://guoyww.github.io/projects/SparseCtrl/

groups.title: SDXL picture get/SDXL 图片获取
Action test test test/还在测试
Fast Color Cast Repair/偏色快速修复
Get Prompt/提示词获取   OOM warning
Keyframe Interpolation = RGB Image Encoder + first & last frames
Image Animation = RGB Image Encoder + starting frame
Video Prediction = RGB Image Encoder + initial 4 frames
Video Prediction = RGB Image Encoder + initial 8 frames
